blurb: 8thâ„¢ is a secure, robust, cross-platform, and fun programming language. Any platform. Every platform.

key_features.title: Secure
key_features.content: 8th was designed from the beginning to avoid the most common software security problems.

key_features.title: Cross-platform
key_features.content: With one click, you generate the executables for any platform 8th supports, from any platform it supports!

key_features.title: Expressive
key_features.content: No reserved words at all and almost no syntax.

key_features.title: General purpose
key_features.content: 8th is primarily a strongly-typed FORTH-like stack-based procedural language with RPN syntax.

key_features.title: Documentation
key_features.content: Documentation is extensive, making it easy to get started with 8th.
